fields.name: oligo_name
fields.description: name of the oligo of the design

fields.name: dna_normalized
fields.description: Number of normalized/scaled dna counts (CPM), 4 decimals

fields.name: rna_normalized
fields.description: Number of normalized/scaled rna counts (CPM), 4 decimals

fields.name: log2FoldChange
fields.description: Fold change (normalized rna/dna ratio, in log2 space), 4 decimals

fields.name: n_bc
fields.description: Number of observed barcodes for the oligo
